reuze.test

Class Intersection2DTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • reuze.test.Intersection2DTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class Intersection2DTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Author:
    Adam Gorby JUnit tests for the various functions included in the Intersection2D class. These deal with intersections of line segments, lines, rays, and geometric shapes.
